dc:title: Cimice.net - Satellite images from ESA
dc:description:
Each folder corresponds to a date and contains two subfolders:
- NDVI: Holds Normalized Difference Vegetation Index (NDVI) images, indicating vegetation health and density using satellite data.
- RGB: Contains Red, Green, Blue (RGB) images, offering visual representations of Earth's surface.

These images are processed from data published by the European Space Agency's (ESA) Sentinel-2 satellite (https://www.esa.int/Applications/Observing_the_Earth/Copernicus/Sentinel-2).
dc:creator: BIG
